text: Ezɨ Jeremaia kamaghɨn Sedekaia mɨgei, “Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, Israelian God, a ghaze, Nɨ mɨdorozim ategh, egh Babilonɨn atrivimɨn gumazir dapaniba ateghtɨ me nɨ inigh, nɨ mɨsueghtɨ nɨ aremeghan koghtɨ, me nguibar kam daboroghtɨ a isighan kogham. Eghtɨ nɨ uan amuiroghboriba ko ia deraghvɨra ikiam.
